node.title: Road Rage Incident Sees 12-Year-Old Girl Shot After Mom Parks at Convenience Store
node.alt: A 12-year-old girl was in stable condition after she was transferred to a hospital after being shot during a road rage altercation, according to police. The alleged shooter fled the scene after the shooting.
node.description: The mother of the girl was allegedly involved in a road rage dispute with another driver in a red Dodge Charger.
node.content:
["A young girl was injured on Friday during a reported road rage shooting at a convenience store in northwest Dallas, Texas.", "The police said that the 12-year-old girl was in stable condition after she was transferred to a hospital to treat her injuries, WFAA reported.", "No details were reported on the severity of her injuries and no arrests have been made.", "The shooting happened late Friday night when the mother was reportedly driving with her two children to the store which is located near the 8200 block of Brookriver Drive, according to the police.", "On her way to the store, the woman allegedly got involved in a road rage dispute with another driver in a red Dodge Charger. The female driver confronted the mother with a gun when they arrived at the convenience store, the police said.", "Another passenger in the Dodge Charger attempted to pull the woman into the car away from the mother, but the gun discharged at one point striking the child, according to the police. The woman later fled the scene after the shot from her gun hit the girl.", "The police are currently investigating the scene near the convenience store. They are also reportedly investigating a location near a hotel.", "A number of incidents where guns went off have been reported over the past few weeks across the nation. Last week, a 911 dispatcher accidentally fatally shot his colleague at a Kentucky dispatch center. Both dispatchers were trading firearms when one of the guns went off and hit 23-year-old Kyle Garett.", "Another accidental gun shooting happened in Georgia where a 3-year-old fatally shot his 5-year-old cousin, using a handgun that belonged to his father.", "", "
A 12-year-old girl was in stable condition after she was transferred to a hospital after being shot during a road rage altercation, according to police. The alleged shooter fled the scene after the shooting.
", "A non-accidental shooting incident also happened in Georgia where a 12-year-old is being charged with murder after fatally shooting an 11-year-old on Thursday. The young boy has also been charged with aggravated assault, tampering with evidence, possession of a firearm during the commission of a crime, possession of a firearm under 18, and cruelty to children in the first degree.", "Additionally, during Thanksgiving weekend, a teen accidentally shot and killed a 5-year-old relative in Minnesota. The police said that the teenager was \"attempting to make a social media video\" and that he was \"handling a gun\" at the time of the incident.", "Meanwhile, a father in Texas accidentally killed his daughter in a shooting where he used a high-power rifle during their hunting trip. The gunshot caused life-threatening injuries to the man's daughter who couldn't be saved at the medical center that she was transferred to after the incident."]
